channel.title: Woman are the reason for our overwhelming desire for sex?
channel.description: Well, I was thinking about it a lot. And I was thinking how men (as the minority) are overwhelmed with the desire of sex. So I was pondering why, Then it hit me when I was at school today. The way females dress are why we have the overwhelming desire. I was thinking well if they didn't dress this way would it be the same. So... This is a kind of a discussion of if you agree or disagree, and why. Also, I don't have a problem with the way they dress.

item.title: Woman are the reason for our overwhelming desire for sex?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:28, topic:255286”][quote author=the fu superior link=topic=337337.msg2624282#msg2624282 date=1231686372]
We could all refuse sex with them. Its a norm that guys masturbate, not girls. If they do, they’re losers. They’ll give it up as some point. ;D

No but really, its in our genes. Just like how, when a baby is born and he/she in put in water, it’s instinct not to breathe.

[/quote]

What? Girls masturbate.

Very few don’t.[/quote]

Very true statement, a friend of mine was asked about it by my friend, and she replied with “what girl doesn’t?”

The desire is simply testosterone.

@Squigglyo wrote:

Lethal snow:

Well, I was thinking about it a lot. And I was thinking how men (as the minority) are overwhelmed with the desire of sex. So I was pondering why, Then it hit me when I was at school today. The way females dress are why we have the overwhelming desire. I was thinking well if they didn’t dress this way would it be the same. So… This is a kind of a discussion of if you agree or disagree, and why. Also, I don’t have a problem with the way they dress.

so your basicaly blaming women for dressing well, looking good and having good healthy bodies.
Yes, its clearly the womans fault that your oggeling her figure as she’s walking past.

Sexual attraction is a part of nature. And has been around since before woman looked hot.

item.title: Woman are the reason for our overwhelming desire for sex?
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:20, topic:255286”][quote author=Squigglyo link=topic=337337.msg2621466#msg2621466 date=1231425148]

thats not correct, i can go for hours and hours without thinking about sex.

I suggest you get a testosterone injection.

or stop taking all that estrogen
[/quote]

fuk off both of you,
my life is intresting enough that i dont need to think about sex to entertain myself.

anyway, wouldnt estrogen just make me think about sex with men? not stop thinking about sex altogether.[/quote]
The thought about having sex just pops into my mind, wether i’m having fun or not.
It really doesn’t have anything to do with your life being interesting or not.
Just typing this sentence made me think about sex.

And i doubt that getting estrogen would make you think differently, i think it would make your titties bigger?
Like your body would get more feminine.

@PaulT wrote:

It just depends on what turns you on, man. It’s your choice in the end. Science says that yes, the reason you are turned on is so you can fuck and reproduce with women. But that’s just science. You can say it’s all the chemicals in your brain or the way other people dress or whatever, but it’s all your choice what you think and what you do, nobody can tell you the reason for your thinking except you.

item.title: Woman are the reason for our overwhelming desire for sex?
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

It’s the instinct of humans. Men want to fuck, and women want to fuck too. You’ll never see ugly chicks dress attractive, do they? Being pretty means that you are healthy and have ‘good’ genes. This is less important as our medical knowhow is improving, but in most cases still the most important factor in choosing a partner. So people want children from attractive/healthy people, and dressing attractive makes you look even better.

exactly, and that’s why God/the universe “programmed” us to like attractive(healthy) people.
Therefore healthy people would have more chance of reproducing than ugly people.
